page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN SANDWICK
page.content: Many people from Sandwick travel to other areas in Shetland for employment. Those travelling to work include managers, proprietors, architects,quantity surveyors, office workers, all types of engineers electricians, hairdressers,drivers, labourers,pilots,nurses,etc. There are two local bakeries which employ approx. 30 workers. Their produce,apart from being sold locally is sent to other areas of Shetland. There is a local hotel employing some people and a social club employing part time staff. There are 4 building contractors,Farquhar &Jamieson, J.R.Jamieson, J.Flaws and G.Inkster. The Sandwick Transport Company provides a coach and taxi service. L.&M.Anderson and L.J.Smith operate knitwear businesses.
